00026 #include "core/trigger_ext_hw.h"
00027 #include "std.h"
00028 #include "sys_time_hw.h"
00029 #include "LPC21xx.h"
00030 #include BOARD_CONFIG
00031 
00032 void TRIG_ISR() {
00033   static uint32_t last;
00034   uint32_t delta_t0_temp;
00035   trigger_t0 = TRIGGER_CR;
00036   delta_t0_temp = trigger_t0 - last;
00037   if (MSEC_OF_SYS_TICS(delta_t0_temp) > 10) {
00038     trigger_delta_t0 = delta_t0_temp;
00039     last = trigger_t0;
00040     trigger_ext_valid = TRUE;
00041   }
00042 }
00043 
00044 void trigger_ext_init ( void ) {
00045   /* select pin for capture */
00046   TRIG_EXT_PINSEL |= TRIG_EXT_PINSEL_VAL << TRIG_EXT_PINSEL_BIT;
00047   /* enable capture 0.2 on falling or rising edge + trigger interrupt */
00048 #if defined TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE && TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE == TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE_RISING
00049   T0CCR = TRIGGER_CRR | TRIGGER_CRI;
00050 #elif defined TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE && TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE == TRIG_EXT_PULSE_TYPE_FALLING
00051   T0CCR = TRIGGER_CRF | TRIGGER_CRI;
00052 #else
00053 #error "trig_ext_hw.h: Unknown PULSE_TYPE"
00054 #endif
00055   trigger_ext_valid = FALSE;
00056 }
